title: Roster Flexibility Around the League, What Moves Can The Lakers Make?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s NBA Front Office Insider Bobby Marks to discuss the challenge facing front offices around the league to fill out rosters with so many players in the COVID health and safety protocols and how that may impact moves around the trade deadline. Plus, what moves can the Lakers make?

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Trades Can The Lakers Make? Challenge Facing The League With COVID
